CustomField.formula: IF( Renewal__c = FALSE && ISPICKVAL(PW_Form_Test_Only__c,"July1 - April30"), "1", /*Today Only*/ IF( Renewal__c = FALSE && ISPICKVAL(PW_Form_Test_Only__c,"May1 - July1"),"2", /*Today or July 1st*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Expired" && ISPICKVAL(PW_Form_Test_Only__c,"May1 - July1"), "2", /*Today or July 1st*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Active" && ISPICKVAL(PW_Form_Test_Only__c,"May1 - July1"),"3", /*July 1st Only*/ IF( Renewal__c = TRUE && PreviousRegistrationStatus__c = "Expired" && ISPICKVAL(PW_Form_Test_Only__c,"July1 - April30"),"4", null))))) /*Today Only*/
CustomField.label: PW FormTest - SetRegistrationPeriod
